price: 53 alors qu’ils l’avaient auparavant reniée, avançant les plus extravagantes suppositions.
arabic: وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَيَقۡذِفُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqad kafarū bihi min qablu wayaqdhifūna bil-ghaybi min makānin baʿīdin
